page.title: 03IBSTOCK EMPLOYMENT - MALE
page.content:
Employment Survey (see "MOTHERS") continued. FATHERS =======
A. Highest professional jobs - e.g. lords, bishops, judges,etc{........0% B. Middle management - e.g.headmaster, accountant,barrister,police inspector,architect, etc.{.........5% C1. Junior management - e.g. teacher, chiropodist, superviser, artist, travelling representative {........4% C2. Manual - e.g. qualified driver, plumber, engineer, mechanic, police constable, coal-faceworker {......49%} D. Semi-skilled - e.g.factory workers, labourers,shop assistants, etc.{..33% E. Those living on state benefit - e.g. old age pensioners, those unemployed for more than two months, etc. {.....................9%
